channel.title: GCP Setup on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in GCP Setup on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: GCP VMs instances
item.description: Compute instances job "gcp" "vm" { project = "my-awesome-company-project" region = "us-central1-a" config { tag = "env:prod" chaos = "terminate" count = 8 } } chaos config: terminate: Finds compute VM instances with specified tag and destroys them. reset: Finds compute VM instances with specified tag and resets the instances. stop: Stops compute VM instances.
